Device Connectivity Protocols

Thingsboard supports following protocols for device connectivity:

  • MQTT
  • CoAP
  • HTTP

See protocol specific documentation for more details. More protocols are coming soon.

Note You can also connect existing devices to the platform using Thingsboard Gateway or design your own gateway using Gateway MQTT API.
